CRC PIM

Product Information Manager

Custom-designed and developed to be an exact match for your organizationâ€™s needs.

Your sales team wants to sell, not go fishing for the product details they need to succeed. Capture all product information and assets in one central repository that speaks, not just to sales, but to every channel in your marketing stream.

Benefits of CRC PIM

Boost sales, team efficiency and success.

Improve customer service and reduce overhead costs.

Launch products faster across multiple geographies.

Streamline marketing team efforts.

No ongoing license fees.

Manage all of your product assets in one seamless enviroment

Every business is different, and your product assortment is no exception. Custom design and development means your PIM environment will be an exact match for your data.
